MemoryInfobox.description: 'A spy searched for a secret way to get cakes into the hands of a politician, knowing that his sweet tooth and the poison in the cakes would serve Athens.'

General_Description: '''Have Your Cake''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a note left on the [[message board]], and decided to look into it.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's happened?''
*'''Woman:''' ''These fresh cakes will delight our local statesman. So long as they reach him in secret.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Secret cakes? Why?''
*'''Woman:''' ''[[Athens]] wants this man dead, and I am only too happy to oblige. These sweet cakes will be his last meal... unless his spies find out where they came from.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to deliver it to the politician.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You read me like an oracle.''
(Accept - I'll handle it.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.''
*'''Woman:''' ''The gods are smiling on me, then.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''May the [[Fates]] be on your side.''
Kassandra sought out the statesman and spoke to him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Someone thought you might need this.''
*'''Man:''' ''Thank you,''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''. Please, take this.''
The man took the cakes, and gave Kassandra her reward.
